views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 12

Hereby I introduce you to my new tweak: GetDatPFP!

What is GetDatPFP and what does it do?
GetDatPFP is my new tweak for Discord. It allows you to copy or download someone's profile picture or server icon.

How does GetDatPFP work?

U can double tap on a user's profile picture in their message to copy the link to their profile picture. (NOTE!: U can not hold here to download the picture)


U can double tap a user's profile picture in the members list to copy the link to their profile picture. U can also hold on it, to download the picture.


U can double tap on a server's icon to copy link to that icon. U can also hold on it, to download the picture.


U can double tap on a user's profile picture to copy their profile picture link or U can also hold on it, to download the picture.


All downloaded pictures are saved in the Photo Gallery (Photos app)

No options to configure.
